  • Method Details

    • insertAppointment

      public static boolean insertAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Instant startTime, Instant endTime, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new Appointment object into the database. Appointment_ID is auto-generated in the database and so is not an input.
      Parameters:
      title - Title
      description - Description
      location - Location
      type - Type
      startTime - Start
      endTime - End
      customerId - Customer_ID
      userId - User_ID
      contactId - Contact_ID
      Returns:
      true if successful insert, false if failed insert
      Throws:
      SQLException - when accessing database

    • updateAppointment

      public static boolean updateAppointment(int appointmentId, String title, String description, String location, String type, Instant startTime, Instant endTime, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      Updates the Appointment object, referenced by the input 'appointmentId', in the database with the new values.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - Appointment_ID
      title - Title
      description - Description
      location - Location
      type - Type
      startTime - Start
      endTime - End
      customerId - Customer_ID
      userId - User_ID
      contactId - Contact_ID
      Returns:
      true if successful update, false if failed update
      Throws:
      SQLException - when accessing database

    • deleteAppointment

      public static boolean deleteAppointment(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Deletes the Appointment object, referenced by the input 'appointmentId', from the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - Appointment_ID
      Returns:
      true if successful delete, false if failed delete
      Throws:
      SQLException - when accessing the database

      public static Appointment getAppointment(int appointmentId) throws SQLException

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments() throws SQLException

      Returns:
      ObservableList of all Appointments in the database
